items.alt: The vertical Castro Theatre marquee rising against a clear blue sky in San Francisco.
items.caption: Castro Lines

items.alt: A bold rainbow-striped mural filling the frame with clean geometric color bands.
items.caption: Color Wall

items.alt: A red fire engine parked on a San Francisco street with the Transamerica Pyramid in the background.
items.caption: Fire + Pyramid

items.alt: A classic carousel in Golden Gate Park with ornate painted details and warm afternoon light.
items.caption: Golden Gate Carousel

items.alt: A red arrow sculpture against a bright blue sky with curved yellow architectural shapes.
items.caption: Pointed Sky

items.alt: A sharply dressed person in a bright purple suit walking through a sunny city intersection.
items.caption: Purple Walk

items.alt: A motorcycle rider passing a colorful mural-covered building in San Francisco.
items.caption: Rolling Past Art

items.alt: A cyclist in a red jacket riding past the Palace of Fine Arts on a bright day.
items.caption: Palace Cruise

items.alt: A person sitting on a bench near the waterfront with bridge lines and open sky behind them.
items.caption: Quiet on the Bay

items.alt: A San Francisco skyline view with the Transamerica Pyramid rising above the city.
items.caption: City Spine

items.alt: A silhouetted figure walking through a glass-fronted terminal with soft purple-blue tones.
items.caption: Terminal Glow

items.alt: Yellow flowers in the foreground with a sunlit building and palm trees softly out of focus behind.
items.caption: Soft California

items.alt: A child in a red shirt riding down a glowing escalator tunnel in Tokyo.
items.caption: Downward Light

items.alt: A busy Tokyo street at night beneath a red illuminated gate and neon signage.
items.caption: Electric Entrance

items.alt: Crowds moving through a neon-lit Tokyo street at night with signs glowing overhead.
items.caption: Neon Current

items.alt: A Tokyo taxi parked at night with reflections of city lights on its windshield.
items.caption: Waiting Fare

items.alt: A chef working inside a small Tokyo kitchen with warm light and hanging tools.
items.caption: Quiet Craft

items.alt: A traditional five-story pagoda standing beneath a clear blue sky in Tokyo.
items.caption: Still Center

items.alt: A lantern-lit storefront at night in Osaka with a motorcycle parked out front.
items.caption: After Hours

items.alt: A quiet Osaka storefront at night illuminated by a single red lantern.
items.caption: Last Light

items.alt: A narrow stone alley in Osaka lit by lanterns and early evening light.
items.caption: Stone Path

items.alt: A woman walking past a restaurant in Osaka, partially blurred by motion.
items.caption: Passing Through

items.alt: A man walking past a seafood shop on a busy Osaka street during the day.
items.caption: Street Rhythm

items.alt: A performer in a yellow jacket framed by colorful signage in Osaka.
items.caption: Neon Character

items.alt: Brightly colored industrial details and signage in an Osaka alley.
items.caption: Hard Color

items.alt: A bold pink storefront with lanterns and signage in Osaka.
items.caption: Pink District
